home.subtitle: successful leaders with balance between business, family, and purpose

bible.content: Blessed is the one who perseveres under trial because, having stood the test, that person will receive the crown of life that the Lord has promised to those who love him.

sayings.content: Commit to the Lord whatever you do, and he will establish your plans.

about.title: I help individuals to become their best version.
about.subtitle: Douglas Borges, Husband, Father, Christian, and Psychologist
description: I am glad that you have made it here to send a distress signal, and inform the Senate that all on board were killed. Dantooine.  I’m not going to Alderaan. I really got to go.

But that to me. Send a distress signal, and inform the Senate that all on board were killed. Dantooine. They’re on Dantooine. The plans you refer to will soon be back in our hands. Alderaan? I’m not going to Alderaan. I got to go home.

services.title: My services
services.subtitle: Increase your team's cohesion and performance, promoting an ethical and balanced work environment.

items.title: Executive Coaching
items.description: Leadership development based on biblical principles, strengthening business decisions with purpose and resilience.

items.title: Emotional Intelligence Programs for Teams
items.description: Increase your team's cohesion and performance, promoting an ethical and balanced work environment.

items.title: Personal and Professional High Performance Counseling
items.description: Guidance for entrepreneurs who need to manage stress and maximize their performance.

items.title: In-Company Workshops
items.description: Practical training based on Christian values to empower leaders and teams in emotional intelligence, productivity, and conflict management.

items.title: Work-Life Balance Consulting
items.description: Support in creating an organizational culture where personal, family, and business well-being align to improve long-term performance.

fellings.title: Burnout
fellings.text: Redefine your professional role and rediscover motivation. By aligning your personal purpose with career goals, you transform stress into positive energy and regain job satisfaction.

fellings.title: Meaning of Life
fellings.text: Discover what really matters in your life, identifying values and motivations that give meaning to your actions. Logotherapy helps you find clarity and direction for a more fulfilling and satisfying life.

fellings.title: Existential Void
fellings.text: Imagine waking up every day knowing there is a greater purpose in your life. Imagine overcoming anxiety, burnout, and sadness with a new sense that motivates and inspires you.

fellings.title: Anxiety Disorders
fellings.text: Learn to deal with anxiety by understanding its causes and finding healthy ways to confront it. Psychotherapy provides tools to confront challenges with more confidence and tranquility.

fellings.title: Depression
fellings.text: Understand the roots of apathy and deep sadness. By reformulating painful experiences, you gain a new perspective and renew your desire to live, overcoming emotional paralysis.

fellings.title: Relationships
fellings.text: If any of these situations feel familiar, know that you are not alone. Many people face the same challenge, but few know the path to overcome it. Here is where Logotherapy can help.

newsletter.title: Receive Exclusive Tips for Leadership and Life Balance
newsletter.description: Gain access to exclusive content about emotional intelligence, strategic leadership with purpose, and how to achieve balance between your personal, family, and business life. Receive inspirational reflections, practical insights, and news directly in your email.

questions.title: Is it relevant to work on issues of work and family with the same professional?
questions.description: Not only relevant, but also recommended. The principles that maintain healthy relationships are the same within all systems that the individual occupies. Laws like order, hierarchy, balance between giving and receiving, and belonging, are present in all our relationships with small specificities in relation to the posture that the client must present. Generally, changing the posture and intervening in any of the 3 pillars mentioned above, influence the other systems, being thus, a source of multiple balance in all areas of your vision.

questions.title: Can psychologists (psychologists) use coaching in their professional practice?
questions.description: According to the CRP/PR- Regional Council of Psychology, it is possible that the psychologist (psychologist) utilizes coaching in their professional practice. However, this technique can be used by the psychologist (psychologist) in a complementary way to the practice. Being thus, the professional should act in a way that is consistent with the Fundamental Principles and Articles of the Code of Ethics of the Psychologist.

questions.title: How can we define coaching and what is the line between psychotherapy and coaching?
questions.description:
According to the CFP- Federal Council of Psychology, while a process that proposes to assist the individual in achieving previously defined objectives, coaching is a technique that transits between fields of action that address autoconsciousness and human development, which are also contents of Psychology.
It is emphasized that the psychologist (psychologist) who utilizes this technique in their practice should do so in a complementary way to Psychology, once their professional practice is as Psychologist (psychologist).

testimonials.title: Results I have helped create
testimonials.subtitle: Hear out what my clients say about me.

items.name: William N
items.description: Patrícia has helped me a lot to understand my feelings and behaviors in front of the challenges I've been facing, mainly in the professional field. I like working with her, because I feel that her previous experience in the corporate world makes her understand the dynamics and daily routine that I bring to the consultations. In addition, she always brings pertinent reflections, which, in conjunction with the weekly exercises, I can put into practice certain changes in behavior or vision of the world. I only have to praise her.

items.name: João Da Silva
items.description: I recommend the complete package of Pat for executives. Pat helps me in the role of coach, mentor, and psychotherapist, with a holistic vision of the personnel and professional, that in the end are intertwined. With her rich experience in the area of HR, advice, activities, and indications, I'm growing inside the function of CEO of my startup.

items.name: Marina Helena, PORMADE
items.description: It was my first experience and I liked it a lot. A natural conversation and at the same time objective and welcoming. Patricia was excellent and I believe that our next sections will be very profitable.

items.name: Fabio H. D. A.
items.description: Dr. Patricia simply changed my life! We have a very special connection and she always knows what to do and how to advise me in the most diverse situations. In addition, she is a smart woman, knows about various subjects and approaches, making her treatment even more complete. I recommend it to everyone I know because I am another person today.

about.title: Conheça Douglas Borges
about.entry: Douglas Borges é um psicólogo e psicanalista com quase 10 anos de experiência, especializado em consultoria psicológica e inteligência emocional. Ele se dedica a ajudar profissionais de alto nível, como CEOs e executivos, a equilibrar suas vidas pessoais e profissionais. Sua abordagem visa alinhar os desafios da gestão corporativa com a qualidade de vida, promovendo um equilíbrio saudável entre as exigências do trabalho e os compromissos pessoais.

items.title: Psicólogo
items.description: Douglas possui registro profissional (CRP/PR 08-21013 e CRP/SC 12-13884) e tem experiência em diversas áreas da psicologia, incluindo a terapia cognitiva comportamental, analítica e psicanalítica.

items.title: Consultoria Organizacional
items.description: Ele atua como psicólogo organizacional, oferecendo treinamento e desenvolvimento para líderes e equipes nas empresas.

items.title: Experiência Diversificada
items.description: Antes de sua carreira na psicologia, Douglas trabalhou como engenheiro químico por sete anos e foi empreendedor em diferentes setores, incluindo indústria e varejo.

approaches.title: Abordagens de Trabalho
approaches.entry: Douglas utiliza uma variedade de métodos terapêuticos para atender às necessidades de seus clientes:

items.title: Psicoterapia
items.description: Oferece sessões terapêuticas focadas na análise de questões emocionais e comportamentais, com o objetivo de promover autoconhecimento e mudanças positivas.

items.title: Orientação Psicológica
items.description: Ajuda indivíduos a resolver conflitos pessoais ou profissionais, desenvolver autoconfiança e equilibrar a ansiedade.

items.title: Análise de Perfil Comportamental
items.description: Realiza análises para compatibilizar perfis emocionais de colaboradores com as expectativas organizacionais.

mission.title: Missão
mission.entry: A missão de Douglas é proporcionar um espaço seguro onde seus clientes possam explorar seus desafios emocionais e encontrar soluções práticas para melhorar sua qualidade de vida. Ele enfatiza a importância do equilíbrio entre as demandas profissionais e pessoais, buscando sempre o bem-estar mental dos indivíduos que atende.

items.title: How to control anxiety
items.description: Combining practical contents and exclusive tools used in psychological orientations, learn about the techniques to control Anxiety. In the event/lecture/training “How to Control Anxiety” led by Dr. Douglas Borges, you will participate in incredible moments to seek the best management of emotions and resignify beliefs and concepts that are negative. It is also addressed subjects about personal relationships, work, money, and much more.

items.title: Viva your story
items.description: Reflections on human protagonism in the professional environment. What story do you want to tell the world?

items.title: Faith and hope in the face of the challenges of the present
items.description: In our lecture, we discuss the life of Tomé the fisherman, who was invited to follow Jesus. But he had a very strong personality.
